mean_cn: adj.爱挑剔的，吹毛求疵的，严厉批评的
mean_en: having or showing a tendency to criticize someone or something severely ;very critical
sentence: My boss is really censorious; he consistently criticizes his employees.
sentence_trans: 我的老板是个挑剔的人，他总在批评下属。
word_etyma: censor审查员 ＋ ious...的 → 用审查员的[眼光]看 → censorious挑剔的
